explains: adj. 粒状的；木纹状的；多粒的；有纹理的

sentences.en: The film is shot in grainy black and white.
sentences.cn: 这部电影拍成有颗粒状的黑白片。

sentences.en: Was it too full of content? Are the images grainy?
sentences.cn: 是不是内容太多了？图像太粗糙？

sentences.en: ANALYSIS: Sensing Salt on the Sea — No More Grainy pictures.
sentences.cn: 分析称：感知海洋盐度——而不是精细化的照片。
